description:
This course is about understanding the architecture of LTE 4G. The operation and protocols involved in LTE. What happens when you power on your smart phone and how it gets attached to the network. Students and working professionals who want to take a fundamental dive into familiarizing themselves with 4G should take this course. If you are looking for advanced concepts such as air interface and scheduling  or mathematical computations this is NOT the course for you. The course is 100% video lectures based with extensive exercises to improve and retain your learning. 

The course is divided into 7 sections starting from 3GPP wireless communication history, LTE architecture, how LTE is different, Control and user plane concept in LTE, Protocols and Operation involved. In the conclusion section , you will also learn about Cellular Network Ecosystem and business model. 

If you want to get nutshell overview on LTE  Fundamental in less time , yes and firm understanding you don't to miss this course. See you on the other side.
title: Wireless Technology: Fundamentals of LTE
